snippet.title: Elderly man dies in central Qld crash
snippet.content: An elderly driver has been killed after his car left the road and crashed into a tree near Rockhampton in central Queensland. The 80-year-old man died at the scene after the crash at Emu Park at around 6.20am on Monday, police said. An 80-year-old woman, who was a passenger in the car, is being treated at Yeppoon Hospital for non-life threatening injuries. (C) AAP 2017
